original_text:
And the women sang to one another as they celebrated,
“Saul has struck down his thousands,
    and David his ten thousands.”
korean_text: 여인들이 뛰놀며 노래하여 이르되 사울이 죽인 자는 천천이요 다윗은 만만이로다 한지라

sentences.original_text: And the women sang to one another as they celebrated,
Saul has struck down his thousands,
